roleset.name: move repeatedly in circular fashion
roleset.note: GYRATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gyrate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from gyrate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ergative
example.text: Stock of United Airlines parent UAL Corp. gyrated wildly yesterday amid speculation that one or more investors may challenge the UAL board's decision to remain independent instead of pursuing a buy-out or other transaction.
example.arg: Stock of United Airlines parent UAL Corp.
amid speculation that one or more investors may challenge the UAL board 's decision to remain independent instead of pursuing a buy-out or other transaction

example.name: ARG0
example.text: He threw some ice cubes in the Pyrex on top of the small cookie, cursing loud the whole time he gyrated the Pyrex, overcome with impatience.
